h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle
content: Along with a variety of lunging attacks and dual-wield slashes, he also has a few unorthodox moves. If he tries to headbutt you by leaping on his side, resist the impulses to kick him when he's down. He'll recover from falling to the ground by doing a breakdancing kick spin while slashing with both swords to lift off the ground and damage you if you get close.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle'.
The content is as follows:
Along with a variety of lunging attacks and dual-wield slashes, he also has a few unorthodox moves. If he tries to headbutt you by leaping on his side, resist the impulses to kick him when he's down. He'll recover from falling to the ground by doing a breakdancing kick spin while slashing with both swords to lift off the ground and damage you if you get close.
